      • loadEvent

        public void loadEvent(java.lang.String event)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Loads event data- name, code, and teams. file name: EVENTCODE ex:BCRI2017, NCCMP2016, CGHS Format: line 1:Event Full name line 2:Comma separated list of team #s
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

        public static void stopServer()

      • changeEvent

        public static boolean changeEvent(java.lang.String name)
        Saves the current event data and changes active event, loading the data for the new event.
        Parameters:
        name - the code/abbreviation for the event to change to.
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • save

        public static boolean save()
        Saves the current team status data to the .status file, and the full inspection data for each team to the teams respective .ins file. Also saves server configuration.
        Returns:

      • saveConfig

        public boolean saveConfig()
        Saves the current Server configuration to the .config file. Should be called any time configuration changes
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • loadConfig

        public void loadConfig()
        Loads the server configuration from the file.

      • clearData

        public static boolean clearData()
        Clears the Server data
        Returns:
